item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A decompilation and port of Sonic Advance 2-a GameBoy Advance game written in C (56 points | 3 comments)
2. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (84 points | 13 comments)
3. Apple needs a Snow Sequoia (440 points | 309 comments)
4. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (99 points | 16 comments)
5. Using uv and PEP 723 for Self-Contained Python Scripts (54 points | 10 comments)
6. Giant, fungus-like organism may be a completely unknown branch of life (15 points | 2 comments)
7. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (628 points | 253 comments)
8. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (279 points | 213 comments)
9. Arctic sea ice sets a record low maximum in 2025 (54 points | 28 comments)
10. Learning Theory from First Principles [pdf] (102 points | 11 comments)
11. Most promoted and blocked domains on Kagi (194 points | 77 comments)
12. I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs (255 points | 452 comments)
13. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. The Unbearable Loudness of Chewing (38 points | 31 comments)
15. Launch HN: Continue (YC S23) – Create custom AI code assistants (150 points | 98 comments)
16. Anti-Orbit Laser Submarines (2017) (24 points | 4 comments)
17. Every Flop Counts: Scaling a 300B LLM Without Premium GPUs (13 points | 1 comment)
18. Golang on the Playstation 2 (51 points | discuss)
19. Emacs Solo: A Surprise System Crafters Live Demo (54 points | 3 comments)
20. Show HN: I built a command line ASCII logo SVG generator for laser cutting (4 points | discuss)
21. Yale professor who studies fascism fleeing US to work in Canada (49 points | 12 comments)
22. First-of-its-kind trial enables paralysed man to stand via stem cell injection (139 points | 25 comments)
23. Better Shell History Search (26 points | 17 comments)
24. Asking good questions is harder than giving great answers (88 points | 11 comments)
25. Clean, a formal verification DSL for ZK circuits in Lean4 (61 points | 2 comments)
26. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (286 points | 154 comments)
27. Take this on-call rotation and shove it (139 points | 96 comments)
28. LibreOffice downloads on the rise as users look to avoid subscription costs (58 points | 27 comments)
29. Dagger: A shell for the container age (153 points | 87 comments)
30. What it takes to add a new back end to Futhark (11 points | discuss)
